name: Gamedev's Cookies
description:
In your dream... that cookie, gamedev's cookies!!!

But the gamedev doesn't like that you, a duck, steal his cookies, then he installed a surveillance system, sensors hided in the ground, two cameras and a drone.

Try to get that cookie and come back without triggering the surveillance alarm!!!

You can play just with mouse, click where you want to go. You have to remember where are the sensors, they are hiding and disappear, sometime they reset and reappear; you have to go get the cookie and come back in the starting place.

it is a little journey, the journey of the duck that fight for the gamedev's cookies.

[little hint : Just a little hint.. the curve of velocity is higher near the time of click and slooow dooooownn.. after a while... YES if you click MANIACALLY the duck runs faster ]
